mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginiae item et Floridae Americae provinciarum, nova descriptio
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hondius, Jodocus, 1563-1612 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : ill. (col.) ; 33 x 46 cm. on sheet 47 x 57 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map by Hondius, from the 1619 French edition of Mercator's Atlas, with text on verso for "Virginie et la Floride," p. 371-372, signature Dddddddd. [original]
Cartouche includes a view of a Florida Indian village on the left, and a Virginia Indian village on the right. [original]
Text of the map in Latin; text on verso in French. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 1: Paul Mellon Bequest, May 12, 2000. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 2: Framed. Gift of the Estate of Helen H. Cohen. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mellon, Paul--Library--Personal copy
